name: Warrior Words
overview: A typing tutor game. The Warrior Words re attacking! To keep them from landing in your city, you must act quickly, to destroy a word, type it and push the space bar. You will score points for each word you destroy and get a bonus by destroying a blinking word. Watch out fo blitz attacks! This game has 6 levels of difficulty. Spelling game where user can set level and speed for grade 4 and above.
